about_the_game:
Check also these game:



The world is dead. You are being hunted.

The chaos will never end. Decimate your enemies, fight against hordes of invaders who know no mercy. Dozens of enemy types await you. Old comrades will stand in your way. Shoot first and never ask questions.



Tools of destruction.

Choose your tools of destruction from more than ten available weapons. Additional will be available for each of them, hidden in levels as a prize for the explorers. Add a grenade launcher to your machine gun. Do net let the enemy stand in your way.



Interact with the world.

Use every tool to hurt your enemy.



Modern graphics with a retro touch.

Project Watcher is an old-style first-person shooter presented with modern rendering techniques.

content_descriptors.notes: The game includes guns, blood and killing.

name: PROJECT WATCHER

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 Or Later
  • Processor: 2.4GHZ Dual Core Processor Or Higher
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 9800GT Or Equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 12 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 2.4 GHZ Quad Core Processor Or Higher
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce GTX 460 Or Equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 12 GB available space
